item.title: THE CHOICE
item.description: We make lots of choices a day and a day. When we wake up, we will to choose what to wear today or what to eat for breakfast. When we go to college, we have to choose which on is best for us. When we choose something sounds bizzard, sounds ridiculous, will we dare to make this decision, will we dare to dream it…
